Protein Browser

  • Protein
  • Other
  • MIT

Display positions of detected peptides, PSMs, variants, etc.

  • uniprot

    required

    UniProt ID

  • dataset

    dataset e.g.'DS1631_1 DS1631_2 DS1632_1'

<togostanza-protein_browser uniprot='Q9NYF8'></togostanza-protein_browser>

The above element will automatically embed the following Stanza in your HTML page.
